name: Zombie Terminator
description:
NOTICE: iphone 5 problem has been fixed. and fully tested

This is the end of the world. You are totally alone in this bloody city. And all you can see around you is zombies, zombies, and zombies.
Human's destiny lies on your shoulder. Kill? Or to be killed? Cry to hide? Or fight to survive?
Look. The world is bleeding and struggling, suffering and dying.
Come on! Don't be a coward. Pick up your gun and save the world!

-Enjoy all kinds of powerful guns in your hand!

-Enjoy the great happiness the fantastic weapon system brings to you.

-Free to choose different killing models as you like.

-You will be exposed to lots of devils and monsters, which might be your nightmare.

-Beat down the boss to get more achievements and rewards!

Slogan: A new free zombie game excites you most. Let the marvelous guns and pictures make your finger crazy!
